description:
Aufgaben 
  
  
   
    
     
      Qualification – B.E / Master of Engineering 
       
       Education – Computer Science 
       
       Experience – 8 – 14 years
       
       
       
       A Data Scientist is responsible for using data to identify trends and patterns to build data models and generate insights that help organizations make better decisions. They must be able to interpret and analyze large datasets, develop predictive models, and effectively communicate their findings to various stakeholders. Data Scientists must have strong technical and analytical skills, including familiarity with programming languages such as Python and R, as well as data mining and visualization tools. They must also possess domain knowledge in the industry in which they are working, and be able to effectively collaborate with other stakeholders such as software engineers, product owners, and business analysts. Responsibilities include: 
       
      
       Analyze large datasets to identify trends, correlations, and patterns 
       Develop predictive models to forecast future outcomes 
       Utilize data mining and machine learning techniques to extract meaningful insights from data 
       Design and implement data pipelines and databases to organize, store, and query data 
       Collaborate with other stakeholders to create data-driven products and services 
       Interpret and communicate results to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner 
       Develop strategies and processes to improve data quality and accuracy 
       Stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. 
      
     
    
   
  
 
 
  
   Qualifikationen 
  
  
   
    
     BE - CS

Responsibilities
       
     
    
     
    
     
      Strategic Roles and Responsibilities
       
     
     
      
       Work as the data strategist with business stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions. 
      
      
       Proactively look for unsolved, data-rich, high-impact business problems and create new opportunities in the AI solutioning pipeline 
      
      
       Evaluate feedback and challenging issues gathered by the business and technical teams and transform them into tractable problems to resolve. 
      
      
       Participate in research paper publishing, Applied AI Competitions; organize hackathons and knowledge conferences/webinars 
      
      
       Work with Principal Data Scientist to devise solution roadmaps and KPIs.
      
       
     
    
     
    
     
      Operational Responsibilities
       
     
     
      
       Design, develop and evaluate highly innovative DL/ML & Stats based models. 
      
      
       Establish scalable, efficient, and automated processes for DL/ML model development, model validation and model implementation. 
      
      
       Conduct feature engineering and implement DL/ML models into production by collaborating with software developers and machine learning engineers. 
      
      
       Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyse model performance and data accuracy 
      
      
       Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques. 
      
      
       Aggregate data from multiple sources to provide a comprehensive assessment. 
      
      
       Create reports, presentations, and process documents to display impactful results. 
      
      
       Communicate solutions to stakeholders and implement improvements as needed to operational systems 
      
      
       Recommend go / no-go on problem statements based on preliminary data analysis in consultation with Principal Data Scientists and AI Solution Managers
      
       
     
    
     
    
     
      Stakeholder Management
       
     
     
      
       Collaborate with AI Champion and Business Data Analyst to define and ratify data requirements and sources 
      
      
       Collaborate with AI Solution Managers, Principal Data Engineer and Principal ML Engineer to build ML/DL models and data prototypes

       Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks. 
       Deep understanding of applied statistical analysis and predictive modelling is desired such as regression, SVM, Tree, Random Forests, Boosting, Neural Network, clustering, forecasting, pattern analysis. 
       Strong know-how of data exploration techniques, such as, mean-variance, k-means, nearest-neighbour, outlier techniques, and correlate anomalous sequences of events. 
       Extensive know-how of Python /R and in object-oriented programming languages with high code quality 
       Passionate about applying emerging DL/ML frameworks to solve business problems and like working in an extremely dynamic, fast paced environment. 
       Proficiency with data mining, applied mathematics, and statistical analysis

 Benefits

 \+ Annual Training Budget 

 \+ ESOPs

About Wells Fargo 
  
  Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE: WFC) is a diversified, community-based financial services company with $2.0 trillion in assets. Founded in 1852 and headquartered in San Francisco, Wells Fargo provides banking, insurance, investments, mortgage, and consumer and commercial finance through more than 8,500 locations, 13,000 ATMs, the internet (wellsfargo.com) and mobile banking, and has offices in 42 countries and territories to support customers who conduct business in the global economy. With approximately 273,000 team members, Wells Fargo serves one in three households in the United States. Wells Fargo & Company was ranked No. 25 on Fortune's 2017 rankings of America's largest corporations. Wells Fargo's vision is to satisfy our customers' financial needs and help them succeed financially. News, insights and perspectives from Wells Fargo are also available at Wells Fargo Stories . 
  
  
 About Enterprise Global Services 
  
  Enterprise Global Services (EGS) enables global talent capabilities for Wells Fargo Bank NA., by supporting over half of Wells Fargo's business lines and staff functions across Technology, Business Services, Risk Services and Product, Analytics and Modeling (PAM). EGS operates in Hyderabad, Bengaluru and Chennai in India and in Manila, Philippines. Learn more about EGS at our International Careers website 
  
  
 Department Overview 
  
  Product, Analytics and Modeling (PAM) brings a team member-based approach to the international talent pool focusing on analytical requirements. PAM encompasses roles that deliver meaningful insights, analysis and reporting based on skills, experience and judgment to support the Enterprise Analytics and Data Science (EADS) organization operate successfully today, and continue on the right trajectory to operate successfully in the future. 
  
  
 About the Role 
  
  Analytics Consultant 3 is a business partner facing role and is responsible for providing reporting and analytic solutions that provide actionable insights to the line of business partners. 
  
  EADS is the central analytics group tasked with solving high-impact business challenges and standing up cutting-edge analytical capabilities to be shared across Wells Fargo's analytic community. 
  
  We are looking for a high performer to join our team and help us solve challenging and interesting business problems through rigorous data analysis and visualization. In this highly consultative and visible role, you will support business intelligence projects from multiple business lines using various technology and techniques ranging from but not limited to Python, SAS, Tableau, Power BI, Microstrategy and in multiple data environments (like Teradata, Aster, Oracle etc.) 
  
  
 Responsibilities 
 : 
 
  The Analytics Consultant 3 will serve as a resource for developing and delivering high performing reporting solutions and data analysis/deep-dives using tools such as Python/SQL. 
  Responsible for performing ad-hoc analysis, reporting, and projects to deep-dive on issues or senior management requests. 
  Attention to detail and accuracy are a must, as the end stakeholders are often the top leadership at the bank. 
  Develop understanding of relevant data sources and build trend analysis using statistical and/or financial analysis, process documentation, profitability analysis, customer/demographic analysis, etc.; 
  Ability to leverage data visualization tools and alternative front-end solutions to delivering data, would be a plus. 
  Work closely with Technology Partners to generate new reports or modify current work products to optimize capabilities and improve efficiency 
  Follow all quality assurance processes, including periodic reviews and transitions and ensures the end product fulfills the project objectives 
  Engage with US partners directly for development and implementation of all projects 
  Conduct exploratory data analysis, and proactively seek opportunities to increase the value of analysis 
 
 Essential Qualifications: 
 
  6+ (Overall Experience) years of experience in one or a combination of the following: reporting, analytics, or modeling (SQL, Python, Tableau); or a Master's degree or higher in a quantitative field such as applied math, statistics, engineering, physics, accounting, finance, economics, econometrics, computer sciences, or business/social and behavioral sciences with a quantitative emphasis and 4+ years of experience in one or a combination of the following: reporting, analytics, or modeling 
  3+ years of SQL and Python programming experience 
 
 
  Data analysis 
   
    Provide exploratory data analysis using SQL, Python 
    Experience in data manipulation using numpy, Pandas and other python libraries. 
    Experience with Databases like Oracle , Teradata, Sql server 
    Strong understanding of relational databases, data quality and exposure to multiple RDBMS source. 
    Designing and implementing enterprise data and reporting architectures 
    Advanced Excel skills 
    Data integration and clean up/preparation of data 
    Experience with structured data and semi-structured text or Excel files 
    Experience in visualization tools such as Tableau/Power BI is a plus, but not mandatory. 
   
 
 Desired Skills: 
 
  Strong collaboration skills 
  High energy & strong communication skills (presentation and narrative skills) 
  Ability to translate analytical data into useful business information 
  Self-driven and passionate about continuous learning 
  Critical thinking and strong problem solving skills 
  Ability to learn the business aspects quickly 
  Knowledge of functional area such as risk, marketing, operations or supply chain in banking industry would be an added advantage. 
  Ability to multi-task and prioritize between projects 
  Ability to work independently and as part of a team 
 
 We Value Diversity 
  
  At Wells Fargo, we believe in diversity, equity and inclusion in the workplace; accordingly, we welcome applications for employment from all qualified candidates, regardless of race, color, gender, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, individuals with disabilities, pregnancy, marital status, status as a protected veteran or any other status protected by applicable law. 
  
  Employees support our focus on building strong customer relationships balanced with a strong risk mitigating and compliance-driven culture which firmly establishes those disciplines as critical to the success of our customers and company. They are accountable for execution of all applicable risk programs (Credit, Market, Financial Crimes, Operational, Regulatory Compliance), which includes effectively following and adhering to applicable Wells Fargo policies and procedures, appropriately fulfilling risk and compliance obligations, timely and effective escalation and remediation of issues, and making sound risk decisions. There is emphasis on proactive monitoring, governance, risk identification and escalation, as well as making sound risk decisions commensurate with the business unit's risk appetite and all risk and compliance program requirements. 
  
  Candidates applying to job openings posted in US: All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran. 
  
  Candidates applying to job openings posted in Canada: Applications for employment are encouraged from all qualified candidates, including women, persons with disabilities, aboriginal peoples and visible minorities. Accommodation for applicants with disabilities is available upon request in connection with the recruitment process.

description:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back. 
 With the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. When you join Team Amex, you become part of a global and diverse community of colleagues with an unwavering commitment to back our customers, communities and each other. Here, you’ll learn and grow as we help you create a career journey that’s unique and meaningful to you with benefits, programs, and flexibility that support you personally and expertly. 
 At American Express, you’ll be recognized for your contributions, leadership, and impact—every colleague has the opportunity to share in the company’s success. Together, we’ll win as a team, striving to uphold our things we value and powerful backing promise to provide the world’s best customer experience every day. And we’ll do it with the utmost integrity, and in an environment where everyone is seen, heard and feels like they belong. 
 Join Team Amex and let's lead the way together. 
 Function Description: 
 The CFR (Credit and Fraud Risk) team helps drive profitable business growth by reducing the risk of fraud and maintaining our customers' confidence in the security of our products. It applies an array of tools and ever-evolving technology to detect and combat fraud, minimize the disruption of good spending and provide a world-class customer experience. The team leads efforts that leverage data and digital advancements to improve service and risk management as well as enable commerce and drive innovation. CFR is responsible for developing and monitoring statistical models for predicting individual and commercial' behaviors such as credit risk, fraud risk, spending and revolve. These models are used for key business decisions made across the customer life cycle to manage risk and accelerate profitable business growth. Underpinning our growth as a company are the tools and capabilities that ensure we prudently take and manage risk in a viable way 
 Roles & Responsibilities: 
 The Credit and Fraud Risk Team of American Express is looking for a Manager – Global Credit Bust Out Decision Science to lead and develop a diverse team of hard-working risk professionals to focus on developing models and data science solutions to mitigate CBO risk. 
 
  Modeling: Develop new and enhance existing models by applying the best-in-class machine learning / AI techniques to mitigate CBO risk 
  Data Science: Evaluate new data sources – internal and external, as well as new variables designed from extensive case reviews for their efficacy in the models. 
  Create and implement the future versions of data science elements, ensuring readiness with CAS modernization. 
  Be well versed in the model governance processes. 
  Work closely with Strategy partners / regional risk teams to identify emerging trends and key areas to mitigate risk. 
  Partner with Strategy partners, Technology teams, 2nd line of defense and other teams to develop system capabilities, models, and design data elements and ensure smooth implementation. 
 
 Minimum Qualifications: 
 3+ years with relevant experience in Decision Science domain 
 Preferred: Experience in Credit and Fraud Risk 
 Academic Background: 
 Post-Graduate in Statistics/Mathematics/Economics/ Engineering/Management 
 Functional Skills/Capabilities: 
 Data Science; Machine Learning; Risk Management 
 Technical Skills/Capabilities: 
 Analytics & Insights: Advanced Statistical Techniques. 
  American Express is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, disability status, age, or any other status protected by law.
  Offer of employment with American Express is conditioned upon the successful completion of a background verification check, subject to applicable laws and regulations.

  Design Visualization and Dashboards.

 Requirements: 
  
  Solid understanding of Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Statistics and Probability, Recommendation systems. 
  Demonstrable knowledge of NLP techniques for text representation, semantic extraction, information retrieval, entity resolution, NER, knowledge extraction, data structures and modeling

  Experience on developing models and systems using supervised and unsupervised algorithms, various architectures of neural networks, time series forecasting, deep learning networks. 
  Working knowledge of ML and DL frameworks like scikit-learn , TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras etc, and other data science ecosystem libraries like pandas, numpy etc. 
  Should have extensive experience with building ML/NLP/DL high-scale, high-impact models in Python or Java, together with developing data pipelines using AWS stack and other big data technology in enterprise grade production environments. 
  Understanding of ML testing and data validation frameworks

  Understanding of fundamental cloud concepts around multi-tenancy, scaling out, serverless , authentication & authorization. 
  
 Additional Skills (Not Required):

  Experience with building apps and services on AWS platform using python, spark, elastic search is preferred.

description:
Overview 
 You're driven, resourceful, and above all else - remarkably smart.
  You love a good challenge. You are the first to roll up your sleeves and work with relentless energy until you solve the unsolvable, beat the unbeatable and you always come out on top. Passable doesn't cut it - you've got fire in your belly to learn more, do more and be more. For you, the sweetest success is shared success and you're known for your good nature. You'll fit right in at Syneos Health where we surround ourselves with the most talented and agile professionals in the industry, but we check our egos at the door.
  Why Syneos Health? Join a game-changing global company that is reinventing the way therapies are developed and commercialized. Created through the merger of two industry leading companies - INC Research and inVentiv Health - we bring together more than 24,000 clinical and commercial minds to create better, smarter, faster ways to get biopharmaceutical therapies to patients. Teaming with some of the most talented professionals in the industry, you'll gain exposure and work in a dynamic environment where you'll be supported with comprehensive resources including emerging technologies, data, science and knowledge sharing. Grow your career with a global company committed to shortening the distance from lab to life.
  This opportunity is with Syneos Health Consulting, an industry-leading consulting firm specializing in the biopharmaceutical industry providing services across a comprehensive range of key Practice Areas including commercial strategy and planning, medical affairs, risk and program management and pricing and market access. You'll join a team with industry focus, depth of functional expertise, and strong scientific and market knowledge that is uniquely positioned to tackle highly complex business and market challenges to develop achievable strategies for our clients.
  Syneos Health is looking for a Data Scientist with solid statistical skills, a creative and entrepreneurial approach to solving problems, and experience in working with healthcare data sets. You will collect and analyze data, build models and provide forecast analyses while managing innovative research projects and developing and validating new methodologies. The Data Science team helps find more efficient and effective ways to commercialize new products. 
 Types of projects
  A small sampling of the kinds of problems we are solving:
 
   Characterize networks of influential healthcare stakeholders and identify high-centrality nodes
   Use historical data of promotional activities to forecast a range of outcomes of a new campaign
   Identify factors that influence patients' adherence to treatment regimens
   Optimize frequency with which sales teams visit physicians' offices
   Measure the effect of sampling and other promotional variables on prescribing behavior
   Find geographies with higher patient prevalence by identifying a sequence of diagnostic procedures predictive of the diagnosis
 
  Responsibilities 
 You will be leading client projects, identifying and applying the right analytical approaches, tools, datasets, and methodologies, as well as opportunities to put them to use.
 
   Translate business requirements into data collection and analysis plans
   Design and implement algorithms to simulate aspects of business or medical activity by combining large scale structured and unstructured data sources
   Visualize and present results and explain the importance and implications of research findings
   Create Powerpoint presentations; present work to business executives
   Collaborate with Consulting teams that include project leaders, project managers and other consultants
   Develop new analytics solutions. Help build an ever-growing code library to develop off-the-shelf business solution modules
   Share your knowledge by training others and documenting best practices
 
  Job Requirements 
 At Syneos Health, we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace. If your past experience doesn't align perfectly, we encourage you to apply anyway. At times, we take into consideration transferrable skills from previous roles. We also encourage you to join our Talent Network to stay connected to additional career opportunities. 
  Along with demonstrated initiative, uncompromised integrity and a results-oriented mindset, the ideal candidate has:
 
   Python + relevant packages (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-Learn), SQL, visualization tools
   Academic or professional background in life sciences
   Entrepreneurial, self-directed attitude
   Motivation for self-directed learning
   Effective written communication and presentation skills
   Client service experience
 
  Make your work matter everywhere. Be a driving force in a rapidly evolving healthcare industry.
  
 #LI-RG2

Data Scientist
 
  This role has been designated as ‘Edge’, which means you will primarily work outside of an HPE office.
 
  Job Description:
 
  Data Scientist
  This role has been designated as ‘Edge’ in the HPE terminology, which means you will primarily work outside of an HPE office.
 
  Job Description
 
  The Data Scientist will play a prominent role in working with planning and operations stakeholders of our business unit, to shape the evolution of the systems and processes providing leaders with business-critical data insights.
 
  Specifically, you will collaborate with the reporting team to maintain and evolve the processes feeding our MySQL database, used as repository of both financial and non-financial data, and as source of our key performance indicators. In fact, our numerous processes feeding this database (both automated processes and human-based processes) need to be enhanced to maximize their efficiency, optimizing both their usability and the accuracy and exploitability of the produced data. In parallel, by working with the Database Administrator, we need evolve the internal architecture of the database in the most effective possible way, to allow effective exploitation by its data clients (whether PowerBI, Excel, or any other tool used for our reporting and Business Intelligence).
 
  This role requires architectural understanding, long-term vision, and process optimization skills. At the same time, while these skills will power your creativity to recommend the best long-term solutions, this role requires substantial skills of hands-on development, in order to deliver concrete functional steps towards the gradual implementation of the plan and vision.
 
  Such concrete development can take several forms. In some cases, it will take the form of data manipulations in our database, or across databases: this obviously requires profound data analysis and data engineering skills, including high proficiency with data manipulation and analysis tools (from Excel to PowerBI). In other cases, it will take the form of automating data operations that are repetitive and should not be kept manual: for this reason, software development experience is welcome, particularly in the area of data automation (via combinations of SQL, PHP, ODBC, VBA, PowerQuery, PowerAutomate, PowerBI ETL tools, Python, C#, C++, or any relevant automation language), in collaboration with the subject matter experts on these tools.
 
  You will have the opportunity to work with all levels of the organization, including both executive leaders and technical contributors. This requires both technical and business acumen, and great communication skills. Fluency in English is necessary for effectiveness in these interactions.
 
  We value curiosity and willingness to learn. We are operating in an evolving environment, within a business unit geared for high performance: we look for proactive team players, who are willing to embrace this mindset, and to become a force for adding value by increasing our overall efficiency.
 
  Education And Experience Required
 
 
   Technical/Business related first degree, or equivalent (engineering, business administration, financial auditing, business informatics, mathematics, statistics…).
   Professional experience of owning business intelligence deliverables (reports, dashboards) in a financial reporting environment, or in contributing to automation and software development in a business reporting environment.
 
 
  Knowledge And Skills
 
  Technical skills:
 
   Proficiency with Microsoft Office tools – Excel, Power Query, Power Pivot
   Familiarity with Excel VBA (capability to maintain/modify macros)
   Experience with software development for data automation (see Job Description)
   Familiarity with ODBC and with other methods of data transfer across databases
   Good understanding and practical experience of building SQL queries
   Experience with PHP programming is welcome
 
 
  Non-technical skills:
 
   Structured, articulated, organized mindset
   Strong problem-solving skills, from troubleshooting and debugging to delivering a solution
   Ability to discuss and rationalize requirements (with both technical and non-technical colleagues) and synthesis of their implication towards architectural design choices
   Excellent verbal and written communication skills, including the ability to manage and influence stakeholders
   Good time management skills, and ability to successfully manage multiple parallel deliverables, working within geographically distributed teams and with cross-functional virtual teams
   Willingness to acquire concrete skills in process management, project management, systems management, change management
 
 
  What We Can Offer You
 
  Extensive benefits, a competitive salary, and participation in the shared values and purpose that make Hewlett Packard Enterprise one of the world´s most attractive employers! At HPE, our goal is to provide equal opportunities, flexible work-life balance, and a constantly evolving career growth.
 
  If you are looking for challenges in an exciting, supportive, and international work environment, then we definitely want to hear from you. Continue the conversation by clicking “Apply now” below, or directly via our Careers Portal at www.hpe.com/careers.
 
  Join us and make your mark!
 
  Find Out More About Us And Follow Us On
 
  https://www.facebook.com/HPECareers
 
  https://twitter.com/HPE_Careers
 
  HPE is an Equal Employment Opportunity /Veterans/Disabled/LGBT and Affirmative Action employer. We are committed to diversity and to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We do not discriminate, and all decisions we make are made on the basis of qualifications, merit, and business need. Our goal is to be one global diverse team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together.

SatSure Analytics India Pvt Ltd. SatSure is a deep tech, decision Intelligence company which works primarily at the nexus of geospatial data, data science and engineering creating products for finance, agriculture, climate change and infrastructure sector impacting millions of lives. We want to make insights from earth observation data accessible to all.  
  
   
  Data Science/Machine Learning team is aimed at developing innovative and state-of-the-art ML/DL solutions. It forms the core of SatSure’s Intellectual Property creation . The team works in a highly collaborative and cross functional manner with Geospatial Experts, ML Engineers and Data Analysts. We Offer
 
 
   This position offers the unique opportunity to develop and apply cutting-edge knowledge of data science related methods and tools to create results and insights that will accelerate the transformation of our business model, and to work with business specialists across Maersk Group.
   
   Maersk Digital team is committed to extracting patterns and insights from data by the application of domain expertise, tools and technology, and is specialized in statistical modeling, forecasting, optimization and machine learning. The team is at the forefront of developing industry leading digital solutions & applications for the organization.
   
   This is an extremely exciting time to join a fast paced, growing and dynamic team that solves some of the toughest problems in the industry and builds the future of trade & logistics.
   
   At A.P. Moller - Maersk we focus on the individual’s development and the right candidate will have broad possibilities to further develop competencies in an environment characterized by change and continuous progress.
 
 
 
   Key Responsibilities
 
 
 
   As a Data Scientist you will participate in various projects with strong support from fellow dedicated team members, to influence business decisions, drive digital transformation at one of the largest companies in the world.
   
   Your responsibilities will be to:
   
   
  
   Participate in data science projects, be hands-on and build statistical models and digital solutions to extract value and create actionable recommendations.
  
 
 
   Identify and operationalize valuable insights from the data into business and digital applications.
 
  
 
  Partner with internal/external stakeholders, product owners and team members and drive product development plans.
 
  
 
  Drive methodological innovations into data science and digital products in the customer analytics, supply chain, Internet-of-Things, asset optimization, operations optimization and similar domains.
 
 
 
   Who we are looking for
 
 
  A total of 5-9 years of industry experience with at least 5 years of experience in building data science models and products, ideally for a product/industrial company.
 
  
 
  M.Sc./M.Tech or PhD in statistics, mathematics, econometrics, computer science, physics or related field.
 
  
 
  A background or profile in Machine Learning, quantitative methods, predictive modelling, statistics or similar.
 
  
 
  Excellent track record of delivery using languages like Python, R, Java and technologies like Hadoop, Git/SVN, JIRA etc.
 
 
   Exposure to IoT/Telematics will be an added advantage.
 
 
  
    Good Familiarity with Agile / Scrum practices; played the role of scrum master, a good team player, balanced with the autonomy and motivation to produce individually.
  
   
  
   Willingness to build on and experiment with cloud data science platforms, in addition to our own services.
  
   
  
   Ability to effectively communicate data science results and analytics value to business stakeholders.

Meet our Team 
 We represent Hitachi Vantara to enterprise clients across industries, establishing business relationships to understand customer challenges so that we can deliver profitable business for Hitachi products, services and solutions. We collaborate as a team and cross-functionally to ensure the success of our customers; success that is celebrated and shared. Our solutions bring value to every line of business and we need people like you to build those deep relationships and to passionately articulate our value proposition.
  
  
  What you’ll be doing 
 Must have overall experience of 8 to 12 years in data science field. Must have a master’s degree in Statistics or Machine Learning or Computer Science Experience in understanding data from a business and technical perspective to provide solutions. Ability to gather insights from data and create analytical models, relationships between business functions. Must have hands-on experience in SQL, Python. Overview 
 You’re driven, resourceful, and above all else - remarkably smart.
  You love a good challenge. You are the first to roll up your sleeves and work with relentless energy until you solve the unsolvable, beat the unbeatable and you always come out on top. Passable doesn’t cut it – you’ve got fire in your belly to learn more, do more and be more. For you, the sweetest success is shared success and you’re known for your good nature. You’ll fit right in at Syneos Health where we surround ourselves with the most talented and agile professionals in the industry, but we check our egos at the door.
  Why Syneos Health? Join a game-changing global company that is reinventing the way therapies are developed and commercialized. Created through the merger of two industry leading companies - INC Research and inVentiv Health - we bring together more than 24,000 clinical and commercial minds to create better, smarter, faster ways to get biopharmaceutical therapies to patients. Teaming with some of the most talented professionals in the industry, you'll gain exposure and work in a dynamic environment where you'll be supported with comprehensive resources including emerging technologies, data, science and knowledge sharing. Grow your career with a global company committed to shortening the distance from lab to life.
  This opportunity is with Syneos Health Consulting, an industry-leading consulting firm specializing in the biopharmaceutical industry providing services across a comprehensive range of key Practice Areas including commercial strategy and planning, medical affairs, risk and program management and pricing and market access. You’ll join a team with industry focus, depth of functional expertise, and strong scientific and market knowledge that is uniquely positioned to tackle highly complex business and market challenges to develop achievable strategies for our clients.
  Syneos Health is looking for a Data Scientist with solid statistical skills, a creative and entrepreneurial approach to solving problems, and experience in working with healthcare data sets. You will collect and analyze data, build models and provide forecast analyses while managing innovative research projects and developing and validating new methodologies. The Data Science team helps find more efficient and effective ways to commercialize new products.
  Types of projects
  A small sampling of the kinds of problems we are solving:
 
   Characterize networks of influential healthcare stakeholders and identify high-centrality nodes
   Use historical data of promotional activities to forecast a range of outcomes of a new campaign
   Identify factors that influence patients’ adherence to treatment regimens
   Optimize frequency with which sales teams visit physicians’ offices
   Measure the effect of sampling and other promotional variables on prescribing behavior
   Find geographies with higher patient prevalence by identifying a sequence of diagnostic procedures predictive of the diagnosis
 
 
  Responsibilities 
 You will be leading client projects, identifying and applying the right analytical approaches, tools, datasets, and methodologies, as well as opportunities to put them to use.
 
   Translate business requirements into data collection and analysis plans
   Design and implement algorithms to simulate aspects of business or medical activity by combining large scale structured and unstructured data sources
   Visualize and present results and explain the importance and implications of research findings
   Create Powerpoint presentations; present work to business executives
   Collaborate with Consulting teams that include project leaders, project managers and other consultants
   Develop new analytics solutions. Help build an ever-growing code library to develop off-the-shelf business solution modules
   Share your knowledge by training others and documenting best practices
 
  Job Requirements 
 At Syneos Health, we are dedicated to building a diverse, inclusive and authentic workplace. If your past experience doesn’t align perfectly, we encourage you to apply anyway. At times, we take into consideration transferrable skills from previous roles. We also encourage you to join our Talent Network to stay connected to additional career opportunities.
  Along with demonstrated initiative, uncompromised integrity and a results-oriented mindset, the ideal candidate has:
 
   Python + relevant packages (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-Learn), SQL, visualization tools
   Academic or professional background in life sciences
   Entrepreneurial, self-directed attitude
   Motivation for self-directed learning
   Effective written communication and presentation skills
   Client service experience
 
  Make your work matter everywhere. Be a driving force in a rapidly evolving healthcare industry.

 Job Description Summary: Rounded data analyst/scientist with quantitative thinking and deep understanding of AI/ML models 
 Job Description: 
 What you need to know about the role- 
 
 You will be responsible for designing and developing the platform architected for scale, which is capable of supporting FP&A teams with their forecasting needs for all Key financials KPIs
 
  Meet our team
 
  You will be part of the FP&A Team, primarily focusing on the Key financial KPIs baseline forecasting process for PP Inc. You will work alongside the brightest Data science talent, solving interesting problems on scalability using the latest Machine learning techniques.
 
  Your way to impact 
 
 Looking for technically strong candidate, with hands on experience with Timeseries forecasting, who is self-motivated, team player, with curiosity to learn and grow, exhibiting strong resolve and challenge the status quo, to strive for excellence in everything they do, with good professional and academic track record to be part of a team that deals with most innovative payments processing team that deals transactions at scale.
 
  Your day to day 
 
 In your day to day role you will be a Machine Learning Engineer/Data Scientist
 
   Lead the design, analysis, and interpretation of projects from data requirement gathering to data processing, modeling, and recommendations for various departments across the company.
   Build and implement predictive models using machine learning algorithms.
   Use advanced analytical and statistical techniques to extract insights from data and identify patterns and trends.
   This role is often required to work in a team environment and be able to collaborate with cross-functional teams such as product managers, data engineers and stakeholders to deliver data-driven solutions.
   Communicate findings and recommendations to stakeholders through data visualization and clear, concise reporting
   Continuously monitor and improve the performance of models over time
   Stay up to date with the latest developments in the field and incorporate new technologies and techniques as appropriate
 
 
  What do you need to bring- 
 
  4+ years of experience building data analytics and science projects
   Strong programming skills, particularly in Python or R
   Strong knowledge of SQL and database management
   Proficiency with statistical analysis and machine learning techniques
   Strong problem-solving and critical thinking abilities
   Excellent communication and presentation skills
   A degree in a relevant field such as Computer Science, Statistics, or Mathematics
   Experience with big data technologies, such as Apache Hadoop or Apache Spark is a plus
   Experience with data visualization tools is a plus
   Experience with cloud computing platforms, such as AWS or Azure is a plus
   Strong understanding of business domain and ability to apply data-driven solutions to real-world problems is a plus
   Good analytical and problem solving skills
   Experience collaborating with business users to define the key business requirements and translate them into process/technical solutions
   Experience in Unix based development environment is a plus
   Experience using industry standard software development tools like Github (IDE / Version Control / Continuous Integration)
   Expertise in online payments and related domains is a plus

 Join us as a Data & Analytics Analyst
 
 
   This is an opportunity to take on a purpose-led role in a cutting edge Data & Analytics team
   You’ll be consulting with our stakeholders to understand their needs and identify suitable data and analytics solutions to meet them along with business challenges in line with our purpose
   You’ll bring advanced analytics to life through visualisation in a meaningful way for key stakeholders, giving you excellent recognition for your work
   We're offering this role at Associate level
 
 
  What you'll do
 
  As a Data & Analytics Analyst, you’ll be using advanced analytics to develop business solutions which increase the understanding of our business, including its customers, processes, channels and products. You’ll be working closely with business stakeholders to define detailed business questions, problems or opportunities which can be supported through advanced analytics, making sure that new and existing processes are designed to be efficient, simple and automated where possible.
 
  As well as this, you’ll be:
 
 
   Working in an Agile way within multi-disciplinary data and analytics teams, co-ordinating resources from across the team and the business to achieve agreed project and scrum outcomes
   Delivering data and analytics expertise and solutions, which brings commercial and customer value to business challenges
   Communicating data and analytics opportunities and bringing them to life in a way that business stakeholders can understand and engage with, supporting them to select the best approach for the business needs
   Using new tools, technologies and methodologies to carry out advanced analytics
   Sharing relevant updates with key stakeholders bringing together advanced analytics, data science and data engineering work that is easily understandable and links back clearly to our business needs
 
 
  The skills you'll need
 
  We’re looking for someone with five years' experience working in a data and analytics and MI reporting role, with knowledge of data architecture, key tooling and relevant coding languages. Along with proficiency in advanced analytics, you’ll bring an ability to simplify data into clear data visualisations and compelling insight using appropriate systems and tooling. You’ll also have good financial services knowledge, and the ability to identify wider business impact, risk and opportunities, making connections across key outputs and processes.
 
  Ideally, you'll have SAS coding knowledge, as the role will include migrating legacy processes.
 
  You’ll also demonstrate:
 
 
   Strong knowledge of data management principles 
  Experience of translating data and insights for key stakeholders 
  Knowledge of data engineering, data science and decisioning disciplines 
  Strong communication skills with the ability to engage with a wide range of stakeholders

All about Ambee
 
  Ambee is building the data foundation to fight climate change. We leverage the power of data science, combined with proprietary on-ground and earth observational data, to give businesses and governments the weapons they need in the war on climate change. Ambee helps professionals, experts, and trailblazers across the globe take action and save the planet.
 
  Your responsibilities
 
 
   We deal with a lot of data, including data pre-processing, writing intrinsic scripts, and automating pipelines.
   Identify predictors and causes of customer/environment-related problems and implement novel approaches related to forecasting and prediction based on research and a lot of creative innovations welcomed.
   Collaborate with multiple teams as an intern of quantitative analysis and where you develop solutions that utilize the highest standards of analytical rigor and data integrity
 
  What we’re looking for
 
 
   We do not care about your CGPA as long as you are skilled and fit our requirements.
   Thorough understanding of machine learning, deep learning, statistics and data processing
   Experience using Numpy, Pandas, matplotlib, seaborn, sklearn and tensorflow (more libraries like plotly, pycaret, geopandas are an added benefit)
   Familiarity with cloud computing and AWS would be helpful
 
  Are you looking for a specific role?
  We’re continuously looking for people who bring new perspectives to our work. We know the impact that curiosity and fearlessness can have. If you are that person and want to join Ambee for a specific role, then write to us at hr@getambee.com.
 
  We’ll get in touch with you.

Job Profile: Sr. Specialist – Data Science, Marsh International Advisory
 
  Location: Mumbai
  MMC Business Unit: Marsh LLC
  MMC Office Name: Marsh McLennan Global Services India Private Limited (MMGS)
  MMGS Function: Knowledge Services
 
  Marsh Advisory is the consultative branch of Marsh, which operates internationally and provides solutions in the increasing needs of our clients to implement risk management programs within their organization. Marsh Advisory helps companies to change their risk profiles so they can improve resiliency, reduce claims, and minimize the total cost of risk. Businesses today regularly tackle multiple challenges, whether facing property and casualty, cyber, reputational, or other risks, Marsh Advisory can help.
 
  Marsh McLennan Global Services India Private Limited (MMGS) is a global knowledge center for the MMC Group and houses teams that work closely with the colleagues across various operating units and locations. This position is out of our Mumbai, India office of MMGS to support our Advisory colleagues.
 
  What can you expect?
 
   Develop frameworks for automating and maintaining constant flow of data from multiple sources
   Centralize and accelerate R&D prototyping
   Liaise closely with the Advisory consultants to enhance and build risk quantification model, Automation tool, econometric model utilizing data science & machine learning techniques
   Extensive research on how to tailor and tweak the existing models to make them more efficient and bespoke to the client’s business
   Data curation and development of algorithms and running simulations
   Build data pipelines and automate end to end process of a model to create speed and efficiency
 
 
  What is in it for you?
  As a global leader in insurance broking and risk management, we are devoted to finding diverse individuals who are committed to the success of our clients and our organization. Joining us will provide a solid foundation for you to accelerate your career in the risk and insurance industry. You will join a team of talented professionals from across the globe which is dedicated to helping clients manage some of the world's most challenging and complex risks. We can promise you extraordinary challenges, extraordinary colleagues, and the opportunity to make a difference.
  Our rich history has created a client service culture that we believe is second to none. Our commitments to Diversity and Inclusion, Corporate Social Responsibility, and sustainability demonstrate our commitment to stand for what is right.
  As a Marsh McLennan colleague, you will also receive additional benefits such as:
 
   A competitive salary
   Employee friendly policies
   Health care and insurance for you and your dependents
   Healthy Work life balance
   A great working environment
   Flexible benefits packages to suit your needs and lifestyle
   Future career opportunities across a global organization
 
 
  We will count on you to:
 
   Mine and analyze data to drive optimization and improvement of product development and implementing business strategies
   Assess the need, effectiveness and discovery of new data sources and data gathering techniques through extensive research
   Apply state-of-the-art advanced analytics, quantitative tools, and modelling techniques to interpret, make inferences, and offer recommendations based on insights from the data
   Visualize the hypothesis and inferences from data using JavaScript, Tableau, PowerBI etc., and create a convincing storyline, which will be influential in implementing business strategies.
   Apply state-of-the-art NLP techniques for text processing, sentiment analysis, text classification etc.
   Work in a diverse environment by partnering with various Marsh teams to implement models and monitor outcomes
   Develop risk models related to Time Series Forecasting, Clustering, GLM/Regression, Boosting, Trees etc
   Develop processes and tools to monitor and analyze model performance and data accuracy
   Communicate the solution, its parameters, its assumptions and its inner workings to audiences who vary widely in their levels of technical fluency and seniority
 
 
  What you need to have:
 
   We’re looking for someone with 5 to 8 years of experience building statistical models and associated data architectures
   Bachelor’s / Master’s in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another Engineering and quantitative field
   Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on research & product development
   Knowledge and demonstrated experience of advanced statistical techniques, concepts and applications - Stochastic Modelling, GLM / Regression, Random Forest, Boosting, Trees, Text Mining, Social Network Analysis, etc.
   Experience of delivering outputs through Visualization using Python, JavaScript and Tableau
   Ability to apply and advise on state-of-the-art advanced analytic and quantitative tools and modeling techniques in order to derive business insights, solve complex business problems and improve decisions
   Expert level proficiency in statistical and computer languages like Python, R (good to have) SQL, etc.
   Strong knowledge of statistics along with experience in predictive and descriptive modelling techniques
   Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, artificial neural networks, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks
   Experience in querying databases
   A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques
   Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams
 
 
  What makes you stand out?
 
   Strong academic rigors with statistics and data science skills from top tier colleges
   Knowledge and experience of open source visualization will give you an edge
   Advanced NLP techniques
   Experience of productionizing models
   Experience in Risk Management would be preferred, especially in climate and sustainability
   Strong programming skills and technical individual contributor
   Ability to take initiatives to strive for improvement in analytic techniques, processes and output

Data Scientist, Value Engineering in Supply Chain Product Operations Job Summary: 
 We are looking for a Data Scientist practitioner to join the Value Engineering team in Bangalore that is excited about data and applying innovative techniques to analyze and bring to bear vast amounts of information in Supply Chain Product Operations for insight and action. Our environment is highly collaborative, fostering learning and teamwork, and encouraging all members to take ownership of our collective success. What you will do: 
 
  Support Design, Solutioning and/or Brain Storming Supply Chain business problems, identify and draw on leading-edge analytical tools and techniques to develop creative approaches and new insights into the issues through data analysis. 
  Identify trends, invent new ways of looking at data, and get creative to drive improvements in both existing and future products. 
  Liaison effectively with multiple collaborators and other functional disciplines. Collaborate with other cross-functional, manufacturing, supplier, and IT teams for end-to-end delivery of solutions use cases. 
  Provide thought leadership in analytics, modeling, and drive to promote the team’s capability and output. Mentor team members and collaborate internally and externally to solve business problems 
  Projects, analysis & reporting, and other responsibilities as assigned by management. 
  Pro-actively recommend process/system improvements and handle implementation/change management for existing and/or new Solutions. 
  Performs other duties assigned as needed. 
 Responsibilities 
 
  Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns that will enhance our supply chain resiliency, deliver products with a focus on customer-first experience, and empower our team to flourish and thrive. 
  Identify valuable data sources and automate collection and reporting processes 
  Undertake pre-processing of structured and unstructured data 
  Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms 
  Standardize data processes across Supply Chain Operations in conjunction with the Business Intelligence team 
  Present information using data visualization techniques 
  As part of Value Engineering, collaborate with New Products Introduction, Manufacturing Test, and Product Lifecycle management, to understand and document requirements, and to deliver innovative solutions that meet the requirements with a simple and intuitive user experience 
  Propose solutions and strategies to business challenges. 
  Responsible to define and implement strategies to improve key business metrics impacting customer service and inventory and/or Supply chain Costs – for existing and/or new analytical solutions. 
  Responsible for identifying problems/issues, recommending appropriate solutions, and follow-up with stakeholders to ensure positive results. 
  Responsible for creating Business Requirement Documents (BRDs), Functional Spec Documents (FSDs), etc. for tracking and effort estimates. 
  Responsible for communicating business-related issues or opportunities to internal management and clients. 
  Communicate on supply chain issues, root cause, corrective action, and full recovery date to business and management. 
  Project management, including time and risk management and project structuring as per situation demands. 
 What you will bring: 
 
  Bachelor’s degree in data science/Statistics/Computer Science/Engineering/a graduate degree in Data Science and/or quantitative field is preferred. 
  Project management skills, with the ability to influence decision-making, work effectively, and implement solutions in a multi-functional, team environment will be preferred. 
  Proven ability in demonstrating, developing, and deploying large to medium analytics Solutions in-house or in client environments will be highly preferred. 
  Experience with demand, inventory, and/or supply planning is highly preferred 
  Experience in data mining, statistical analysis, modeling, optimization, or similar analytics 
  Understanding of artificial intelligence and machine learning concepts 
  Knowledge of SQL, Python, and R; familiarity with C++ is an asset 
  Experience with Alteryx workflow design 
  Experience using business intelligence and visualization tools such as Tableau 
  Working knowledge of data frameworks such as Snowflake 
  Experience with Databricks AI/ML; familiarity with Jupyter Notebook is beneficial 
  Inquisitive, proactive, and interested in learning new tools and techniques 
  Analytical mind and driven to solve complex problems 
  Problem-solving proficiency 
  Comfortable working in an environment where problems are not always well-defined 
  Ability to communicate data insights in appropriate detail to all levels of the organization 
  Well-organized, a self-starter, independent, and ready to work with minimal supervision 
  A respectful and committed teammate, willing to excel and work with versatile people

Our people work differently depending on their jobs and needs. From hybrid working to flexible hours, we have plenty of options that help our people to thrive. 
 This role is based in India and as such all normal working days must be carried out in India. 
 
 Join us as a Data & Analytics Analyst
 
 
   This is an opportunity to take on a purpose-led role in a cutting-edge Data and Analytics team
   You’ll be consulting with our stakeholders to understand their needs and identify suitable data and analytics solutions
   You’ll bring analytics to life through visualisations to tell powerful stories and give you excellent recognition for your work
   We're offering this role at Associate Vice President Level
 
 
  What you'll do
 
  As a Data & Analytics Analyst, you’ll be driving the use of advanced analytics in your team to develop business solutions which increase the understanding of our customers, processes, channels and products.
 
  Working a standard shift pattern, you'll use your technical skills to source and analyse data from composite and complex data sources in various structured and unstructured formats.
 
  As well as this, you’ll be:
 
 
   Leading and coaching your colleagues to plan and deliver strategic project and Scrum outcomes
   Planning and delivering data and analytics resources, expertise and solutions, which bring commercial and customer value to business challenges
   Communicating data and analytics opportunities and bringing them to life in a way that business stakeholders can understand and engage with
   Adopting and embedding new tools, technologies and methodologies to carry out advanced analytics
   Understanding the business context to study the distributions of data and to present the analysis in business-oriented visualisations or stories
 
 
  The skills you'll need
 
  We’re looking for someone with an interest in data and analytics, who has knowledge of data architecture, key tooling and relevant coding languages.
 
  Along with advanced analytics knowledge, you’ll bring an ability to simplify data into clear data visualisations and compelling insights by using appropriate systems and tooling. Data engineering and science skills would be advantageous.
 
  You’ll also demonstrate:
 
 
   Knowledge of how to develop dashboards on Tableau
   Coaching and leadership experience with an ability to support and motivate colleagues
   Good knowledge of data management practices and principles 
  Experience of translating data and insights for key stakeholders 
  An understanding of data engineering, data science and decisioning disciplines

Optum is a global organization that delivers care, aided by technology to help millions of people live healthier lives. The work you do with our team will directly improve health outcomes by connecting people with the care, pharmacy benefits, data and resources they need to feel their best. Come make an impact on the communities we serve as we help advance health equity on a global scale. Here, you will find talented peers, comprehensive benefits, a culture guided by diversity and inclusion, career growth opportunities and your life's best work.(sm) 
   Primary Responsibilities: 
  
   Interaction with Business partners/stakeholders to understand business requirements and applicability of Data Science models into Business requirements 
   Apply knowledge of statistics, machine learning, programming, data modeling, simulation, and advanced mathematics to recognize patterns, identify opportunities, pose business questions, and make valuable discoveries leading to value delivery, prototype development and product improvement 
   Use a flexible, analytical approach to design, develop, and evaluate predictive and prescriptive models and advanced algorithms that lead to optimal value generation from the data 
   Hypothesis generation and validation for a business problems using Data Science techniques 
   Prepare data for data science problem; Design, Develop and Implement ML/Statistical Models keeping Business problems in mind 
   Conduct complex data analysis and develop reports on results 
   Present written and verbal data analysis findings, to both the project team and business stakeholders 
   Timely delivery of assigned tasks/projects and ensure that delivery is as per Business expectations 
   Consistently demonstrate clear and concise written and verbal communication 
   Proven ability to effectively use complex analytical, interpretive, and problem-solving techniques 
   Inter/Intra team co-ordination and working effectively with team members 
   Comply with the terms and conditions of the employment contract, company policies and procedures, and any and all directives (such as, but not limited to, transfer and/or re-assignment to different work locations, change in teams and/or work shifts, policies in regards to flexibility of work benefits and/or work environment, alternative work arrangements, and other decisions that may arise due to the changing business environment). The Company may adopt, vary or rescind these policies and directives in its absolute discretion and without any limitation (implied or otherwise) on its ability to do so 
  
  Required Qualifications: 
  
   Undergraduate degree or equivalent experience 
   Working experience & In-depth understanding of statistical techniques (supervised - like linear regression, logistic regression, Classification, Decision Trees, SVM etc. and unsupervised - Clustering and Association etc.) & prior experience in solving Business problems using one of the techniques 
   Working experience in either Big Data Platform or in Cloud (Azure/AWS) to develop Data Science models 
   Working knowledge and in-depth experience in generating and validating hypotheses 
   In-depth knowledge and working experience with analytics and statistical software such as R, Python and others to develop AI/ML solutions 
   Problem solving / critical thinking 
   Good communication skills 
  
  
  Preferred Qualifications: 
  
   Knowledge of NLP (NLP Packages, Language Models, Transformer models etc.) 
   Knowledge of No-SQL Databases (Mongo-DB)/ Graph database 
   Understanding of US Healthcare 
  
  
  Careers with Optum. Our objective is to make health care simpler and more effective for everyone. With our hands at work across all aspects of health, you can play a role in creating a healthier world, one insight, one connection and one person at a time. We bring together some of the greatest minds and ideas to take health care to its fullest potential, promoting health equity and accessibility. Work with diverse, engaged and high-performing teams to help solve important challenges. 
   At UnitedHealth Group, our mission is to help people live healthier lives and make the health system work better for everyone. We believe everyone-of every race, gender, sexuality, age, location and income-deserves the opportunity to live their healthiest life. Today, however, there are still far too many barriers to good health which are disproportionately experienced by people of color, historically marginalized groups and those with lower incomes. We are committed to mitigating our impact on the environment and enabling and delivering equitable care that addresses health disparities and improves health outcomes - an enterprise priority reflected in our mission.

Marsh is a global leader in insurance broking and risk management
 
  Marsh McLennan Global Services India Private Limited (MMGS) is seeking candidates for the following position based in the Mumbai, India office:
  Assistant Manager – Data Analytics 
 What can you expect?
 
   Involvement in shaping the ‘books’ of some of the largest insurance companies in the world
   An open work culture with an emphasis on innovation and solving business problems
   A global workplace with frequent project collaboration with colleagues across geographies
   An energetic and entrepreneurial team with a breadth of experience in areas such as data science, visualization and descriptive analytics.
   Acute thinking skills: able to understand the business problem, and structure it to identify relevant dataset and answer through a strong visual storyboard
   Synthesis skills- Ability to connect the dots and answer the business question
   Collaborative approach to work, in order to work with global setup with multiple stakeholders.
 
 
  What is in it for you?
  Discover what's great about working at Marsh and McLennan Companies – from the opportunities that our size brings, to our commitment to our communities and understanding the benefits you’ll receive. We are four businesses with one PURPOSE: helping companies meet the challenges of our time.
  As a global leader in insurance broking and risk management, we are devoted to finding diverse individuals who are committed to the success of our clients and our organisation. Joining us will provide a solid foundation for you to accelerate your career in the risk and insurance industry. You will join a team of talented professionals from across the globe which is dedicated to helping clients manage some of the world's most challenging and complex risks. We can promise you extraordinary challenges, extraordinary colleagues, and the opportunity to make a difference.
  Our rich history has created a client service culture that we believe is second to none. Our commitments to Diversity and Inclusion, Corporate Social Responsibility, and sustainability demonstrate our commitment to stand for what is right.
  As a Marsh and McLennan Company colleague, you will also receive additional benefits such as:
 
   A competitive salary
   Employee friendly policies
   Health care and insurance for you and your dependants
   Healthy Work life balance
   A great working environment
   Flexible benefits packages to suit your needs and lifestyle
 
 
   Future career opportunities across a global organisation
 
 
  Preview to our current base policies:
 
   Maternity benefits: Sum insured for normal delivery and C-section is INR 75,000.
   Mental health on IPD (up to full sum insured) and OPD (up to 40,000) to cover Psychiatric and related treatments
   Home care and treatment : Within the sum insured limit
   Hotel quarantine: Covered in the policy
   Make shift or temporary hospital treatment : Within the sum insured limit
   Enhanced colleague experience through Benefitme portal (one stop self-service for enrollment)
 
 
  Voluntary Parental Policy: 
 
  Sum Insured options: 3 Lacs, 5 Lacs and 7 Lacs
   Pre-existing diseases: Covered from Day 1 with no waiting periods
   Co-pay: 20% on all claims expect capped aliments
   Internal Congenital ailment: Covered
   Room Rent Restriction: INR 7,500/- per day for normal room & INR 10,000/- per day for ICU; Proportionate Clause applicable
   Pre and post hospitalization: Covered for 30 days and 60 days respectively
   Time exclusions: Waived for diseases (30 days / 1 year / 2 years / 4 years)
   Although completely voluntary, colleagues would be encouraged to enroll considering dependents age & pre-existing health conditions
 
  6 monthly instalment option through payroll
 
  We will count on you to:
 
   Ability to work with International stakeholders across all levels, understand business objectives and make sure any analysis and findings are aligned to those business objectives
   Assembling large, complex sets of data Identifying, implementing internal process improvements including optimizing data delivery and automating manual processes
   Deliver complex regular and ad-hoc analysis: Support on complex analysis requests from various business areas to provide insight on specific areas of interest on a regular as well as ad-hoc basis
   Gather, analyse and model data using analytical tools and techniques to develop business insights to drive decisions.
   Should possess strong data visualization abilities using qlikview/qliksense
   Show strong problem solving capability, understand the business requirement and explore all possible solutioning technique to achieve the desired result.
   Should possess strong data visualization abilities to communicate the insights from data
   Attention to detail is a must with a focus on executive quality presentations
   Multi-tasking on multiple projects on tight timelines occasionally.
   Sound verbal and written communication skills.
 
 
  What you need to have:
 
   Bachelor’s degree in Engineering / Analytics or Master’s Degree in Statistics/Computer Applications/ IT/Analytics /any discipline related to Data visualisation / Analytics.
   3-6 years of progressive experience mining large complex data sets, using a variety of advanced quantitative/modelling techniques.
   Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques

 Amazon Search AI Data Team is looking for an experienced Language engineer. The mission of the Search Data Platform team is to build an end-to-end data platform to deliver high quality datasets at scale. The team owns the systems and pipelines that enable data acquisition, ingestion, classification, visualization, human annotation, training, evaluation, and active learning.
  
  Search AI Data is part of the Amazon Core Search organization which owns search functionality, the main discovery mechanism for customers shopping on Amazon worldwide. It is responsible for (a) research, development, and operation of the search customer experience for apps and websites (recommendation widgets, refinements, whole page optimization, rendering, autocomplete); (b) search services for physical and digital items (data ingestion, natural language processing, index generation, query serving); (c) site reliability engineering and compute capacity management for all search services; (d) search economics and search performance data science. In addition, we collaborate closely with several machine learning (ML) applied science teams that develop and test ML models to improve the quality of semantic matching, ranking, computer vision, image processing, and augmented reality.
  
  Key job responsibilities
  In this role, the language engineer will:
  
 
   Design and develop data annotation guidelines and workflows.
   Manage and process large amounts of structured and unstructured data.
   Adopt and design quality control metrics and methodology to evaluate the quality of data annotation.
   Maximize productivity, process efficiency and quality through streamlined workflows, process standardization, documentation, audits and investigations on a periodic basis.
   Handle annotation & data investigation requests from multiple stakeholders with high efficiency and quality in a fast-paced environment.
   Collaborate with scientists and engineers in defining metrics, guidelines, and workflows.
   Initiate and contribute towards improvement projects, present solution proposals, and implement them.
   Onboard and train junior data associates on an ongoing basis.
   Handle work prioritization and deliver based on business needs.
   Be flexible in changes to conventions deployed in response to customers’ requests and change workflows accordingly.
 
 
 

 
  Experience in data science and quantitative research.
   Hands-on experience with machine learning and deep learning techniques in the fields of NLP and search.
   Experience with AWS services (S3, Sagemaker, ML language services, etc.).
   Knowledge of user experience concepts and methods.
   Familiarity with online retail (e-commerce).

You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back. 
 At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways. Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible — and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. We back our colleagues with the support they need to thrive, professionally and personally. That’s why we have Amex Flex, our enterprise working model that provides greater flexibility to colleagues while ensuring we preserve the important aspects of our unique in-person culture. Depending on role and business needs, colleagues will either work onsite, in a hybrid model (combination of in-office and virtual days) or fully virtually. You won’t just shape the world of software. 
 You’ll shape the world of life, work and play. Our Software Engineers not only understand how technology works, but how that technology intersects with the people who count on it every day. Today, innovative ideas, insight and new perspectives are at the core of how we create a more powerful, personal and fulfilling experience for all our customers. So, if you’re interested in a career creating breakthrough software and making an impact on an audience of millions, look no further. You won’t just keep up, you’ll break new ground. There are hundreds of opportunities to make your mark on technology and life at American Express. Here’s just some of what you’ll be doing: - Taking your place as a core member of an agile team driving the latest development practices - Writing code and unit tests, working with API specs and automation - Identifying opportunities for adopting new technologies.
  
  
 Focus: 
 Designs, develops, solves problems, debugs, evaluates, modifies, deploys, and documents software and systems that meet the needs of customer-facing applications, business applications, and/or internal end user applications. 
 Organizational Context: 
 Member of a product engineering or delivery and integration team reporting to a Senior Engineer, Engineering Director or Director Product Delivery & Integration. 
 How will you make an impact in this role? 
 Software Development
  
  
 
  Intermediate to advance level ability in software development, such coding assignments 
  Function as member of an agile team by contributing to software builds through consistent development practices (tools, common components, and documentation) 
  Participate in code reviews and automated testing 
  Debug basic software components and identify code defects for remediation 
  Enable the deployment, support, and monitoring of software across test, integration, and production environments 
  Automate deployments in test or production environments 
  Automatically scale applications based on demand projections
 
  
  
 Leadership
  
  
 
  Demonstrate increased self-reliance to achieve team goals 
  Influence team members with creative changes and improvements by challenging status quo and demonstrating risk taking
 
  
  
 
 Range of Impact/Influence: 
 
  Accountable for team completing work you’re leading and work you are doing as agreed upon 
  Accountable to team for delivery of quality work
